# direction

**Instance Property**

The layout direction of the page indicators.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var direction: UIPageControl.Direction { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageControl/Direction-swift.enum/natural].

## Customizing the layout direction

- **UIPageControl.Direction**: Decribes the layout direction of a page control’s indicators.
